snippet: The violent rebellion against President Bashar al-Assad’s government has left peacemaking efforts paralyzed.
abstract: United Nations Security Council decides to terminate its observer mission in Syria, where the increasingly violent rebellion against Pres Bashar al-Assad’s government has left diplomatic peacemaking efforts paralyzed; UN agrees to keep a much smaller in the country in hopes that a political solution is still possible.
lead_paragraph: The violent rebellion against President Bashar al-Assad’s government has left peacemaking efforts paralyzed.

headline.seo: U.N. to End Its Observer Mission in Syria
headline.main: As Diplomatic Efforts Stall in Syria, U.N. Says It Will End Its Observer Mission
headline.print_headline: As Diplomatic Efforts Stall in Syria, U.N. Says It Will End Its Observer Mission
